api.body:
require "pixcHelper"
require "pixcNetwork"
if self.helper ~= nil then
	return 
end
self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
self.network = createPixcNetwork()
self.open = false
self.ip = self.helper:getProperty("Multicast IP","239.255.255.250")
self.port = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("Port Send","6451"))
self.ipLocal =pixc.getRoot().Utils.Network.convertLocalAdapterEntry(self.helper:getProperty("Adapter IP","0.0.0.0"))
self.portLocal= tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("Port Multicast Receive","1900"))
self.IsOpen(false, true)
self.network:configureUdp(
	self.ip,
	self.port,
	self.ipLocal,
	self.portLocal,
	function (handle, data) self().receive(data) end,
	function(handle, error) pixc.log("closeCallback: "..error) end)
self.network:joinMulticast(ip)
self.network:setStatusCallbacks(
	function (...) pixc.log(...) end,
	function(isOpen) self().IsOpen(isOpen, true) end)
self.network:start()
api.name: init

api.body:
if self.network == nil then return end
self.network:close()
self.network = nil
self.helper = nil
api.name: uninit

api.body:
if self.network == nil then return end
self.network:send(msg)
api.name: send
